Label: Expense Ops Plan (remaining year) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount)
    -
    SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Expense Ops Plan (Current Year) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Yearstart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount)
-
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Yearstart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount)

Label: Expense Ops Plan (remaining year) - ARUS
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)
    -
    SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (remaining year) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM','CRISIS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Crisis Response Ops Plan (remaining year) - ARUS
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
   	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'CRISIS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: NOI Ops Plan (remaining year) - ARUS
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
   	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM','CRISIS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Crisis Response Ops Plan (Current Year) - Nonexcluded
Expense Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS
Expression:
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)
-
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Revenue Ops Plan (remaining year) - ARUS
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: NOI Actual (Full YTD) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Yearstart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: NOI Actual (Prior Month) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today(),-1)))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Revenue Ops Plan (remaining year) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: NOI Ops Plan (remaining year) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Expense Actual (YTD) - ARUS
Expression:
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)
-
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: NOI Actual (YTD) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: $ Buffer (Success and Negotiation Only)
Description:
$ change from Target Rate to Effective Rate
for Success and Negotation increases only

Label: NOI Ops Plan (YTD) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Yearstart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Bonusable NOI % - ARUS
Expression:
Floor((([Bonusable NOI Actual (YTD) - ARUS] + [Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (remaining year) - ARUS]) - [Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS])
/Fabs([Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS])+1, .001)

Label: Revenue Actual (YTD) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: NOI Ops Plan (Full Current Year) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Expense Actual (YTD) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Yearstart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount)
-
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Yearstart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount)

Label: Bonusable NOI Actual (YTD) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM','CRISIS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: NOI Ops Plan (Prior Month) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today(),-1)))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Occupancy Ops Plan (YTD)
Expression:
IF(vOccupancy='Units',
	NUM([Occupied Units Ops Plan (YTD)], '##,##0'),
	IF(vOccupancy='Percent',
		NUM((AVG(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)/
		AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))), '##0.0%')
	)
)

Label: Total Unoccupied Rooms
Description: Total number of Unoccupied Rooms.

Label: Revenue Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(), -1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Crisis Response Ops Plan (remaining year) - Nonexcluded
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'CRISIS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, ExcludeBonusFlg-={'1'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Occupied Units Ops Plan (YTD)
Expression:
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
/COUNT({<%DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>} distinct MonthYear)

Label: Target %
Description:
% change from Starting Rate to Target Rate
for Success and Negotation increases only
Expression:
(SUM({<TargetRate={">0"}, EffectiveRatePrevious={">0"}, EffectiveStatus={'Success', 'Negotiation'}, ExcludeOtherMetricsFlg={'1'}>}TargetRate) - SUM({<TargetRate={">0"}, EffectiveRatePrevious={">0"}, EffectiveStatus={'Success', 'Negotiation'}, ExcludeOtherMetricsFlg={'1'}>}EffectiveRatePrevious))
/SUM({<TargetRate={">0"}, EffectiveRatePrevious={">0"}, EffectiveStatus={'Success', 'Negotiation'}, ExcludeOtherMetricsFlg={'1'}>}EffectiveRatePrevious)

Label: Effective Rate
Description:
Rate on effective date
for Success and Negotation increases only

Label: Crisis Response Ops Plan (Current Year) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'CRISIS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Revenue Ops Plan - Total
LabelExpression:
=IF(vValues='Number',
'Ops Plan Revenue',
IF(vValues='PerUnit',
'Ops Plan Revenue Per Unit'))
Expression:
IF(vValues='Number',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount)),
IF(vValues='PerUnit',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount))
/
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
))

Label: Crisis Response Actual (YTD) - ARUS
Expression: SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'CRISIS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(vNOIStartARUS)<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount)

Label: Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (remaining year) - ARUS
Expression:
IF(Month(Today()) <> 1, //For January, just do total prior year actuals. After January, do YTD actual + current month and remaining year Ops
	SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'EBITDARM','CRISIS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(Monthstart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}, Division={'Atria Retirement United States'}>}Amount),
    0
)

Label: Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - Nonexcluded
Effective %
Description:
% change from Starting Rate to Effective Rate
for Success and Negotation increases only

Label: $ Buffer
Description: $ change from Target Rate to Effective Rate

Label: Expenses Ops Plan
Expression:
IF(vValues='Number',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount)-SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}>}Amount)),
IF(vValues='PerUnit',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount)-SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Today())))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Today())))"}>}Amount))
/
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
))

Label: Rent Ready Rooms
Description: Number of unoccupied rooms that are currently rent ready.

Label: Bonusable NOI % - Nonexcluded
Expression: Floor((([Bonusable NOI Actual (YTD) - Nonexcluded] + [Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (remaining year) - Nonexcluded]) - [Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - Nonexcluded])/Fabs([Bonusable NOI Ops Plan (Current Year) - Nonexcluded])+1, .001)

Label: Occupied Units Actual (YTD)
Expression:
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
/COUNT({<%DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>} distinct MonthYear)

Label: Target Rate
Description:
Loaded Rate - Buffer
for Success and Negotation increases only

Label: Occupied Units Ops Plan (Current Year)
Expression:
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
/COUNT({<%DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}>} distinct MonthYear)

Label: Alerts Avg Response Time
Expression: Avg({<[Resident Device]={'Resident Device'}, ResponseRequired={'Response Required'}, EventFlg={'Event'}, Response={'Responded'}, ExcludeOtherMetricsFlg={'0'}>} ResponseTime)

Label: Starting Rate
Description:
Rate as of notification date (X days before rate increase, varies by community)
for Success and Negotation increases only

Label: Occupancy Ops Plan (Current Year)
LabelExpression:
=IF(Month(Today()) = 1, 
	Year(MonthStart(Today(),-1)),
    'Current Year'
)
&' Ops Plan '
&
IF(vOccupancy='Units', 'Occupied Units',
IF(vOccupancy='Percent', 'Occupancy %'))
Expression:
IF(vOccupancy='Units',
NUM([Occupied Units Ops Plan (Current Year)], '###,##0'),
IF(vOccupancy='Percent',
NUM(AVG(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount)/
		 AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEUNITS'}, Scenario={'OP_CURRENT'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(YearEnd(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey])), '##0.0%')
))

Label: Occupancy Actual (YTD)
Expression:
IF(vOccupancy='Units',
NUM([Occupied Units Actual (YTD)], '###,##0'),
IF(vOccupancy='Percent',
NUM(AVG(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)/
		 AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEUNITS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MonthStart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey])), '##0.0%')
))

Label: Revenue Actual - YTD
LabelExpression:
=IF(vValues='Number',
'YTD Actual Revenue',
IF(vValues='PerUnit',
'YTD Revenue Per Unit'))
Expression:
IF(vValues='Number',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)),
IF(vValues='PerUnit',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount))
/
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
))

Label: Rate Compliance Y0
Description: Number of Compliant Sales (98%-102% of Selling Rate) divided by the total number of sales.

Label: REVPOR
Expression:
SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILREV'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(MOnthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)
/
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))

Label: Expenses Actual - YTD
Expression:
IF(vValues='Number',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)
-SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)),
IF(vValues='PerUnit',
(SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount)
-SUM({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'SUBAILOPEX'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount))
/
SUM(AGGR(AVG({<FactType={'OneStream'}, AccountGroup={'AVEOCCUNITS'}, Scenario={'Actual'}, %DateKey={">=$(=Date(YearStart(Monthstart(Today(),-1))))<=$(=Date(MonthEnd(Today(),-1)))"}>}Amount), MonthYear, [%CommunityKey]))
))

Label: % of Rent Ready Rooms
Description: Number of rooms that are Unoccupied and Rent Ready out of the total number of Unoccupied Rooms.

Label: Alerts
Expression: Count({<[Resident Device]={'Resident Device'}, ResponseRequired={'Response Required'}, EventFlg={'Event'}, Response={'Responded'}, ExcludeOtherMetricsFlg={'0'}>} UniqueCode)
